meanings.definition: To summarize or give a brief account of something previously stated or done.
meanings.sent1: Let me recap the main points of the story for you.
meanings.sent2: I always recap my day before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to recap its adventures to the dog.
meanings.sent4: Her mind began to recap the events of the past week like a movie reel.
meanings.sent5: He used colorful drawings to help recap the lesson for the students.
